name: S(hpoogm)NEK
description:
S(hpoogm)NEK - A different snake game. People said it couldn't be done - and they were right. This is the infamous first entry of the S(hpoogm)NEK series with a few improvements / tweaks, mostly it being ported from GMS to GMS2.

Controls:

Left  / Right - Turn

Shift - Use reset bomb. Effectiveness is based on power bar.

Space - Hold to stop when you have the dark green powerup.

Escape - Return to title screen
